# Defensive Primer (Level 1 Abjurer)
## Overview
*This surprisingly ornate and heavy volume is more than three-quarters empty. Tightly written notes on the precepts of arcane defense and the vulnerabilities of supernatural entities fill the first two pages.*

**Protection** Average lock (DC 25)

**Opposition Schools** Conjuration, enchantment

**Value** 160 gp

**Spells**

1stâ€”*[[Burning Hands (Spell)|burning hands]]*, *[[Detect Undead (Spell)|detect undead]]*, *[[Expeditious Retreat (Spell)|expeditious retreat]]*, *[[Magic Missile (Spell)|magic missile]]*, *[[Protection From Evil (Spell)|protection from evil]]* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Ray of Enfeeblement (Spell)|ray of enfeeblement]]*, *[[Shield (Spell)|shield]]* <sup>S</sup>

**Source:** Ultimate Magic, pg. 121
